actions.name: Quick Feet
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat increases by 50% if affected by a Major Status Affliction. If the user has @Affliction[paralysis], they do not get the @Affliction[slowed] Affliction.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat increases by 50% if affected by a Major Status Affliction. If the user has @Affliction[paralysis], they do not get the @Affliction[slowed] Affliction.
